name: word-auto-open-with-document
title: Auto-open a task pane with a document
shortDescription: Configure a document to automatically open your Office Add-in's task pane when the document is opened.
longDescription: Configure a document to automatically open your Office Add-in's task pane when the document is opened.

thumbnails.alt: The autoopen sample's task pane with buttons to turn autoopen on and off.

references.name: Automatically open a task pane with a document
references.description: Some scenarios require that a task pane open automatically when a document opens, without explicit user interaction. You can use the autoopen task pane feature, introduced in the AddInCommands 1.1 requirement set, to automatically open a task pane when your scenario requires it.
